context: Pre-Term Growth & Development ,Child specialists , Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review:
Excellent doctor. Excellent staff. Well organised.
No words can capture Dr Poonam. As a parent of twins preterm babies I was worried and having super anxiety state but she really helped to calm me down, take care of babies very well. She is very experienced padetrician and always smiling face. Amazing treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Poonam is very child friendly. We came to her for our baby’s vaccination. The whole procedure is systematic and orderly which is why We would definitely recommend her to all.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After our delivery on 15th August 2022 the doctor visited our room and explained everything in the most wonderful and simplest of manner

The best part again about this doctor is that she always answers calls and always replies to messages on whatsapp

U can call her at whatever time of the day.
Today we visited the doctor and she cleared each of our doubt properly
We were a bit scared as our baby had fever this morning so i called the doctor and she told us the treatment

So quite satisfied with her as well
Would recommend you to consult the doctor as a paediatrician

She always encourages breast feed over bottle feed and explains everything in a proper manner 


Extremely satisfied with her response and also with the way she handles the babies during and after vaccination

Thank you

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Poonam Mam have explained the health issues and doubts friendly way. She has checked my baby with full care and given us satisfaction. I am following up since my baby birth and my concern and my panic mode was also satisfied with her answers. thanks Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Children's Health,Paediatric Intensive Care,Neonates,Consultation provided for newborns ,
review:
Dr Poonam is the primary physician for my son, since he was born. She has been extremely patient, affable, and empathetic. She has an amazing bedside manner and an ability to understand and empathize with the parents. 
I would strongly recommend her. I don't have enough words to describe my experience with her. We will continue to consult with her for my son - be it for general vaccination and healthcare.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I been consulting Dr. Poonam since the day my daughter was born. She is now 7 months old and we have been visiting her regularly. She is one the kindest doctors I have ever met. She is calm and explains all the issues with ease.
She is good at her job and is very accessible to patients.

tags: Wait time,
review: Dr Poonam is very nice and humble- she understands and then advice. No exaggeration. Focuses on exclusive mothers milk and my son is keeping healthy and active. We came all the way from GUrgaon to seek her advices, because she keeps things simple and apt for child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Poonam made our journey as a first time parent very smooth and relaxed. She guided me from the very beginning that exclusive breast feeding is not impossible and slowly helped me transition my boy to a cup directly when he turned one. We didn’t introduce bottle to our baby boy and it felt as if he never needed one. She understands the problem and doesn’t prescribe too many medicines. We are very satisfied and grateful to aunty for being our guide.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sidhana has been of immense help over the last 15 years for both my daughters (elder one is now 15); not only on regular health issues but also unexpected ones, for which we are particularly appreciative.  Over such a long association we have noticed that she takes particular interest in getting to know the child and can relate well to young kids as well as adolescents.  

Very caring and patient; capable of providing pointed advice; very helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am first time mom and recently blessed with a child in AUG 2022. . At Ck birla , I met Dr Poonam. She is extremely humble, available, helpful and directive doctor who not just do her job with extreme dedication but understand and guides new parent with super convenience and traditional way.
She encouraged me for basics including breast feed and honestly i am loving and enjoying the journey. You don't need any bottle, formula milk , pump..in case you follow basics. I am very satisfied and looking forward to great care for my child under Dr Poonam s guidance. Thanks

I don't know she remembers me I am Bhawana Kapoor who delivered a premature baby boy in 2009 he survived for a few weeks but could not survive long as he was a premature child .  He was doing fine but suddenly god knows what happened, was it my destiny or doctors fault .but end result was I was left with nothing in spite of continuous admissions in hospital for several weeks and admission of my baby for so many weeks .he could not even see his house and just went to heaven like this .but thanks to doctor Poonam who just gave supporting words but the only thing which I am not able to digest is that she didn't allow her sisters to tie Rakhi .which is not wrong on her part. she was hopeful that my baby will make it but he could not. she always said that there is plenty of life left to tie Rakhi for his sisters .but nobody knew that he was not going to make it .and  my daughters could never tie Rakhi to their real brother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Poonam is very polite and answers all queries. She re-assured us with our several queries for our new born son. She has a calming influence. Thank you.
She is very polite, supportive and understanding by nature . She explained every little thing nicely.

*** ** ******** *** **** ************ ** ******explains everything in detail ..v humble n tries to cure the baby with minimal medication which I like the most about her..

Highly experienced doctor ..must visit her once for your Little one

My baby was admitted to NICU after birth for breathing support. Dr. Poonam Sidana took good care of my baby.  She is very experienced with calm nature. She is someone whom we can trust blindly for our child.
My Name is Chaitanya I am 12 years old she's my doctor when I was born She is very sweet she is very polite

I have no words to express my gratitude towards Dr.Poonam, she took care of my twin babies in NICU for 1 month and its really incredible how she helped my premature babies to grow so well.. really cant thank enough .. she took right decisions at right time .. her experience reflects how professional she is ... i would highly recommend doctor poonam ..

She is relatable doctor, doesn't complicate things.

Decides the course of action for child basis the requirement and not unnecessarily by the rule book.

Example- when my child wasn't latching initially and losing weight, she asked me not to panic and be patient.

She doesn't force any medicines..we are happy having her for our baby.
She ** *** **** *** give best advise for children health n always there to gv guidance.n always there on available on cal when ever required
Very nice , soft spoken  ,kind and experienced Dr..encourage me alot for mother feeding to my baby.

Dr Poonam is very polite and very generously explains to our queries. She is extremely gentle with the baby and an amazing doctor!
